content.title: New Reward Options with Exclusive Panda Merchandise! üêº
content.creator:
ChloeCollaborator
February 20, 2025
content.content:
Dear PandaVista Pledgers,
The development of PandaVista is progressing smoothly. We have added a limited-edition option that includes Panda-themed merchandise as a reward. Currently, there are two choices available: the Panda Bottle Opener Fridge Magnet and the Panda Phone Holder.
You can find this option on the rewards page.
Thank you for your support!

comments.text: Are there pictures of the bottle opener and phone holder somewhere?
Hi! Yes, you can check the new rewards options on the project page page
